Poems in two parts first, an interlocutory discourse concerning the creation, fall, and recovery of man : secondly, a dialogue between faith and a doubting soul / by Samuel Slater. Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.
[4], 64, [8], 52 p.
Printed for Tho. Cockeril ..., London : 1679.
Each part has caption title. Imperfect: stained and torn. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
